name: Lentil Black Eyed Pea Soup with Greens
description: Easy Lentil Black Eyed Pea soup with Spinach. Masoor Raungi Palak Dal. Easy spiced protein filled soup. Vegan Gluten-free Soy-free Indian Recipe. Serves 3 to 4
recipeIngredient: 1/4 to 1/2 tsp cayenne/ red chili powder
2   tomatoes (1 loaded cup tomatoes, finely chopped or blended into purree)
1/2  cup chopped spinach  (or baby greens of choice)
1/2 cup small chopped green beans (or carrots or zucchini or other veggies)
cilantro and lemon juice for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Soak the black eyed peas and lentils for half an hour if making in a saucepan. or soak at this step for 15 minutes if making in a pressure cooker. (time needed by steps 2 through 5).
recipeInstructions.name: Soak the black eyed peas and lentils for half an hour if making in a saucepan. or soak at this step for 15 minutes if making in a pressure cooker. (time needed by steps 2 through 5).

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, heat oil in a saucepan or pressure cooker. Once hot, add cumin seeds and cook for a minute or until cumin seeds change color.
recipeInstructions.name: Meanwhile, heat oil in a saucepan or pressure cooker. Once hot, add cumin seeds and cook for a minute or until cumin seeds change color.

recipeInstructions.text: Blend onion, garlic, ginger with a tbsp or so water until coarsely blended. Add to the pan. Cook for 5 minutes or until fragrant and golden.
recipeInstructions.name: Blend onion, garlic, ginger with a tbsp or so water until coarsely blended. Add to the pan. Cook for 5 minutes or until fragrant and golden.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the spices, mix and cook for a minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the spices, mix and cook for a minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Add tomatoes and cook for 6 to 7 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add tomatoes and cook for 6 to 7 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Drain the black eyed peas and lentils and add to the pan with salt, lemon juice, 2.5 cups water, greens and veggies. Mix in.
recipeInstructions.name: Drain the black eyed peas and lentils and add to the pan with salt, lemon juice, 2.5 cups water, greens and veggies. Mix in.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook in a Pressure Cooker: Close the lid and pressure cook for 15 minutes after the pressure has reached. (Manual 15 minutes at high pressure in Instant Pot). Let the pressure release naturally.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook in a Pressure Cooker: Close the lid and pressure cook for 15 minutes after the pressure has reached. (Manual 15 minutes at high pressure in Instant Pot). Let the pressure release naturally.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook in a Saucepan: In the saucepan, add 3 cups of water instead of 2.5 cups. Cover and cook over medium heat for 20 minutes. Reduce heat and continue to simmer over medium-low heat for another 20 to 25 minutes or until the lentils and black eyed peas are tender to preference.

Reduce heat and continue to simmer over medium-low heat for another 20 to 25 minutes or until the lentils and black eyed peas are tender to preference.

recipeInstructions.text: Garnish with cilantro and lemon juice and serve as a soup bowl, or with rice or flatbread
